name: Dove Body Wash - Relaxing Care Shea Butter & Vanilla Nourishing(1000 ml)
description: Tired of cleansing and then moisturizing daily? With Shea Butter & Vanilla Dove Relaxing Care Nourishing Body Wash, nourish your skin while in the shower. 2-in-1 Dove Nourishing Body Wash works as shower gel and moisturizer too. It consists of a unique blend of naturally derived cleansers and plant-based moisturizers to give you a relaxing and pampering shower time. No more dry skin! No more extra moisturizing! Dove Body Wash has an innovative formula consisting of Nutrium Moisture, the same moisturizing ingredients as lotion or cream, to deeply nourish your skin and also strengthen the skin’s natural moisture barrier. Adding to it, the extracts of Shea Butter & Vanilla provide the needed nutrients to the skin. While Shea Butter helps boost skin moisture and soothe skin, the Vanilla extract helps reverse the skin damage. Enriched with the goodness of nature, this gentle & moisturizing body cleanser reaches deep into the skin to wash out impurities and hydrate skin from within. Dove believes a moment of self-care goes a long way, and thus is always innovating to create products that help you become a better version of yourself. With rich, creamy lather, Dove Body Wash helps you relax, while the soothing scent of shea butter and vanilla calms your senses, creating a truly pampering shower experience for you. With the true motive of CARE, Dove never tests its product on animals anywhere in the world and is certified PETA Cruelty-Free. name: The Derma Co 1% Salicylic Body Wash for Body Acne with Glycolic Acid(250ml)
description: Get acne off your back! Lather up with The Derma Co 1% Salicylic Acid Daily Exfoliating Body Wash. Powered with salicylic acid, glycolic acid and pentavitin, this body wash is sulfate-free and it's gentle enough for daily use but also tough enough to keep body acne at bay. Just add a splash of this new antibacterial formulation to your everyday bathing routine and get ready to cleanse your skin deeply while reducing inflammation and itching. A renowned keratolytic agent, salicylic acid exfoliates the skin and targets acne and blackheads. Pentavitin, an excellent hydrating ingredient boosts hydration and locks in moisture for upto 24 hours.Dermatologically tested, 1% Salicylic Acid Daily Exfoliating Body Wash is safe for all skin types including sensitive skin. Features:Deeply cleanses and exfoliates: Get fresh and clean skin every morning! Formulated with salicylic and glycolic acid, this sulfate-free body wash gently exfoliates the skin and removes impurities from deep within.Fights body acne: Keep body acne at bay! Combat zits and blackheads while reducing inflammation and itching with this antibacterial formulation.Smoothens rough and bumpy skin: Go from rough and bumpy to smooth and hydrated skin with pentavitin, an excellent hydrating ingredient in this body wash that keeps dryness at bay, resulting in moisturized and supple skin.Suitable for: This body wash is dermatologically tested, sulfate-free, safe and suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin. About the Brand: The Derma Co. provides dermatological solutions, as per your skin type, at your doorstep. Using technologies like artificial intelligence to correctly diagnose your concerns, TDC dermatologists build effective products and regimes to solve your problems. Its advanced clinical formulations contain desired actives in high dosages as per dermatologist recommendations and hence deliver significantly better performance than off-the-shelf products available in the market.Explore the entire range of  Shower Gels & Body Wash available on Nykaa. name: Nykaa Wanderlust Japanese Cherry Blossom Shower Gel(300ml)
description: Nykaa Wanderlust Bath & Body Collection bottles up all your travel experiences with fragrances that still linger at the back of your head. Our range of bath and body products lets you revisit those lands, filling your heart with memories and treating your skin to the comfort and well-being it deserves!        ETHIOPIAN COFFEE SHOWER GEL  Our Shower Gel captures the warm energising fragrance of Ethiopian Coffee. It lathers and purifies your skin while whisking you away on a caffeine trip to the lush coffee plantations sprawled across acres of hilly landscape where you savoured the invigorating fragrance of rich coffee beans that instantly re-energized your senses. The gel provides a burst of hydration to keep your skin soft.        HIMALAYAN HEMP SHOWER GEL  Our shower gel captures the refreshing essence of Himalayan hemp. It lathers perfectly to gently purify your skin, while transporting you to the foothills of the Himalayas where you camped out with your favourite bunch. The gel provides hydration to keep your skin soft and moisturised.         Activated Charcoal SHOWER GEL  Our shower gel captures the invigorating fragrance of flickering charcoal flames. Infused with charcoal powder, the gel cleanses and detoxifies your skin, while transporting you to those cozy bonfire nights, when you enjoyed that fresh open-air fragrance of charcoal. It provides hydration to keep your skin soft and moisturised.        Californian Almond Milk SHOWER GEL  Our shower gel captures the nourishing essence of almond. It lathers perfectly and gently purifies your skin, transporting you to that summer road trip to California, when you made a stop for an impromptu healthy picnic and sipped on some cool almond milk. The gel provides hydration and keeps your skin soft and supple.        STRAWBERRY DAIQUIRI SHOWER GEL  Our shower gel captures the luscious flavour of freshly plucked strawberries. Infused with a sweet strawberry fragrance, the gel gently cleanses your skin and takes you back to the time when you enjoyed this frozen fruity delight. It provides hydration and keeps your skin soft and supple.        Mediterranean Sea Salt SHOWER GEL  Our shower gel captures the cool breeze of the Mediterranean Sea. Infused with the aquatic fragrance of that fresh air, it gently purifies your skin, and gives you a beautiful beach experience. The gel provides hydration and keeps your skin soft and supple.         Country Rose SHOWER GEL  Our shower gel is infused with the delightful fragrance of rose that lathers perfectly giving you the ultimate bathing experience. It provides hydration and keeps your skin soft and supple.        French Lavender SHOWER GEL  Our refreshing shower gel brings the same sense of calming aroma that gently cleanses your skin with lots of comforting rich lather. It provides hydration and keeps your skin soft and supple.        Japanese CHerry Blossom SHOWER GEL  Our rich creamy shower gel lathers perfectly, elevating your bathing experience. It provides hydration and keeps your skin soft and supple.        Sicilian Sweet PEa SHOWER GEL  Our delicately scented shower gel cleanses your skin of all dirt, grime and daily fatigue, uplifting your mood. It provides hydration and keeps your skin soft and supple.         Hawaiian Jasmine SHOWER GEL  Our shower gel is scented with the sweet fragrance of Hawaiian Jasmine and purifies your skin of dirt, grime and impurities. It provides long-lasting hydration and keeps your skin soft. Explore the entire range of  Shower Gels & Body Wash available on Nykaa.
